welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Toronto, a diverse and vibrant city known for its iconic skyline, multicultural neighborhoods, and lively arts and entertainment scene. We invite you to explore our beautiful city and immerse yourself in all it has to offer."

restaurants.name: Auberge du Pommier
restaurants.description: Auberge du Pommier is a french restaurant located in Toronto.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toronto City Centre Airport serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buttonville Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Buttonville Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Lester B. Pearson International Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Lester B. Pearson International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Oshawa Airport serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
